Question: Shenzhen Electronics Industries Association CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
TCL Electronics

Product: TCL Showcase at CES 2024

- TCL will showcase over a hundred cutting-edge products, including QD-Mini LED TVs, air conditioners, refrigerators, washing machines, mobile devices, AR glasses, and commercial displays.
- The company will unveil one of the world’s largest QD-Mini LED TVs and the latest breakthroughs in display technology.
- TCL will introduce smart connected mobile device entertainment solutions, including smartphones, tablets, and smart glasses, along with NXTPAPER display technology and RayNeo AR glasses with 3D head-up display and AI capabilities.
- The company continues to inspire greatness through collaborations and initiatives, including its role as the Official TV Partner of the National Football League (NFL) and its commitment to environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives.
- TCL has witnessed consistent growth in TV and mobile device shipments globally, ranking first in TV shipment in several countries and top three in Android phone shipment in North America.
Summary_cn:
TCL电子

产品：TCL在2024年国际消费电子展上展示

- TCL将展示超过100种尖端产品，包括QD-Mini LED电视、空调、冰箱、洗衣机、移动设备、增强现实眼镜和商用显示器。
- 公司将展示全球最大的QD-Mini LED电视之一以及最新的显示技术突破。
- TCL将推出智能连接的移动设备娱乐解决方案，包括智能手机、平板电脑和智能眼镜，以及NXTPAPER显示技术和配备3D抬头显示和人工智能功能的RayNeo增强现实眼镜。
- 公司继续通过合作和倡议激发非凡成就，包括成为美国国家橄榄球联盟(NFL)的官方电视合作伙伴，并致力于环境、社会和治理(ESG)倡议。
- TCL在全球范围内电视和移动设备的发货量持续增长，在多个国家的电视发货量中名列前茅，并在北美地区的安卓手机发货量中名列前三。
